product_name: Banana Boat Sport Performance Lotion SPF 30 - 8 fl. oz.
long_description: Providing water-resistant sun protection while you're playing outside, the 8 oz. Banana Boat Sport Performance SPF 30 Lotion shields your skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Water- and sweat-resistant formula won't run into your eyes and has a non-greasy feel. 8 fl. oz. bottle can be packed easily for on-the-trail reapplication.
short_description: Providing water-resistant sun protection while you're playing outside, the 8 oz. Banana Boat Sport Performance SPF 30 Lotion shields your skin from harmful ultraviolet rays.
